query:
UPDATE tournaments
            SET 
                name = $1,
                description = $2,
                game_type = $3,
                board_size = $4,
                registration_status = $5,
                visibility = $6,
                match_style = $7,
                max_snakes_per_user = $8,
                required_participants = $9,
                updated_at = now()
            WHERE tournament_id = $10
